fullDescription.intro: Fpa generates a FIS using "FPA" FisPro Function. It generates the FIS from a configuration (e.g. configuration generated by Hfpsr Node) and a dataset. Click here for more informations.

option.name: Strategy to determine the data subset used to initialize the rule conclusion, 0 for MIN, 1 for DEC (default value)

fullDescription.option: the strategy to determine the data subset used to initialize the rule conclusion

option.name: Minimum matching degree for rule generation (default value: 0.3)

fullDescription.option: the strategy to determine the data subset used to initialize the rule conclusion

option.name: Activity threshold for performance computation (default value: 0.1)

fullDescription.option: the activity threshold for performance computation
